main event: A bright object was sighted in the sky breaking into two pieces and falling in a northwest direction.
interesting points: The object was observed on ground radar as a bright light,The sighting lasted for 35 seconds,The object was reported to have broken into two pieces before disappearing,It was noted as possibly being a balloon, meteor, or aircraft,The sighting location was in the Pacific Ocean at coordinates 20 N 134 W.
sighted object: a bright light object breaking into two pieces
